不攻击，持续恢复范围内所有友军<@ba.kw>生命</>（每秒相当于自身攻击力<.en: Does not attack but continuously restores the <@ba.kw>HP</> of all allies within range (the HP restored per second is equal to <@ba.kw>{attack@atk_to_hp_recovery_ratio:0%}</> of self ATK). Self is unaffected by <$ba.inspire>Inspiration</>

同时恢复三个友方单位的生命.en: Restores the HP of 3 allies simultaneously

攻击造成<@ba.kw>超远距离的群体法术伤害</>.en: Deals <@ba.kw>AOE Arts damage in a long line</>

不成为其他角色的治疗目标，每次攻击到敌人后回复自身<@ba.kw>{value}.en: Can't be healed by other units. Recovers <@ba.kw>{value}</> self HP every time this operator attacks an enemy

可以进行<@ba.kw>远程攻击</>，但此时攻击力降低至80%.en: Can launch <@ba.kw>Ranged Attacks</> that deal 80% of normal ATK

技能可以治疗友方单位.en: Can heal allies by using skill(s)

Deals <@ba.kw>Arts damage</>
Can use <@ba.kw>Summons</> in battles

击杀敌人后获得1点部署费用，撤退时返还初始部署费用.en: Obtain 1 DP after this unit defeats an enemy; Refunds the original DP Cost when retreated

Can attack <@ba.kw>all blocked enemies</>

技能可以使敌人产生<@ba.kw>位移</>\\n可以放置于远程位.en:
Can <@ba.kw>Shift</> enemies by using skills

可以攻击到<@ba.kw>较远敌人</>，攻击自身未阻挡的敌人时攻击力提升至12.en: Can attack enemies <@ba.kw>from range</>; When attacking enemies not blocked by self, increase ATK to 120%

可以攻击到<@ba.kw>较远敌人</>，攻击自身未阻挡的敌人时攻击力提升至<@.en: Can attack enemies <@ba.kw>from range</>; When attacking enemies not blocked by self, increase ATK to <@ba.kw>{atk_scale:0%}</>

攻击范围内的<@ba.kw>所有敌人</>，对自己前方一横排的敌人攻击力提升至1.en: Attacks <@ba.kw>all enemies</> within range, and deals 150% damage to enemies in the row directly in front of this unit.

对攻击范围内<@ba.kw>所有敌人</>造成伤害\\n拥有50%的物理和法术闪.en:
Deals Damage to <@ba.kw>all targets</> within range
50% chance to dodge Physical and Arts attacks and is less likely to be <@ba.kw>targeted</> by enemies

操作<@ba.kw>浮游单元</>对敌人造成<@ba.kw>法术伤害</>\\n.en: Controls a <@ba.kw>Drone</> to deal <@ba.kw>Arts</> damage to an enemy; When the Drone continuously attacks the same enemy, its damage will increase (up to 110% of the operator's ATK)

操作<@ba.kw>浮游单元</>造成<@ba.kw>法术伤害</>\\n单元攻.en: Controls a <@ba.kw>Drone</> that deals <@ba.kw>Arts damage</>; When the Drone attacks the same enemy, its damage will increase (up to 110% of the operator's ATK)

攻击造成<@ba.kw>法术伤害</>，在找不到攻击目标时可以将攻击能量<@ba.en: Attacks deal <@ba.kw>Arts damage</>; When unable to find a target, attacks can be <@ba.kw>stored up</> and fired all at once (Up to 3 charges)

无法被友方角色治疗，攻击造成<@ba.kw>群体伤害</>，每攻击到一个敌人回复.en: Cannot be healed by allies; Attacks deal <@ba.kw>AOE Damage</>; Recovers <@ba.kw>50</> HP for every enemy hit during attacks, up to Block count
Cannot be healed by allies; Attacks deal <@ba.kw>AOE Damage</>; Recovers <@ba.kw>{value}</> HP for every enemy hit during attacks, up to Block count

Normally does not attack and has 0 Block; When skill is inactive, ATK gradually increases up to <@ba.kw>+{atk:0%}</> over <@ba.kw>{max_stack_cnt}</> seconds. ATK is reset when the skill ends

优先攻击攻击范围内<@ba.kw>防御力最低</>的敌方单位.en: Prioritizes attacking the enemy with <@ba.kw>lowest DEF</> within range first

不会受到攻击，恢复周围友方单位的生命.en: Cannot be attacked; restores the HP of nearby friendly units

可以使用陷阱来协助作战，但陷阱无法放置于<@ba.kw>敌人已在</>的格子中.en: Can use traps to assist in combat, but traps cannot be placed <@ba.kw>on tiles already occupied by an enemy</>

攻击时需要消耗子弹且攻击力提升至<@ba.kw>120%</>，不攻击时会缓慢地.en: Attacks consume Ammo to increase ATK to <@ba.kw>120%</>; While not attacking, Ammo will be slowly reloaded (max capacity 8).

攻击造成<@ba.kw>法术伤害</>，技能开启后改为治疗友方单位（治疗量相当于.en: Deals <@ba.kw>Arts damage</>; When skill is active, attacks instead restore the HP of allies (heal amount is equal to <@ba.kw>{heal_scale:0%}</> of ATK)

造成法术伤害时附带相当于<@ba.vup>8%</>伤害的<$ba.dt.apo.en: When dealing Arts damage, deals an additional <@ba.vup>8%</> as <$ba.dt.apoptosis2>Necrosis damage</>

受到来自自身阻挡单位的伤害降低<@ba.kw>15%</>.en: Takes <@ba.kw>15%</> less damage from enemies blocked by this unit

攻击造成<@ba.kw>法术伤害</>，可以造成<@ba.kw>元素伤害</>.en: Attacks deal <@ba.kw>Arts damage</>, and can inflict <@ba.kw>Elemental damage</>

持有<@ba.kw>回旋投射物</>时才能够攻击（投射物需要时间回收）.en: Can only attack while holding a <@ba.kw>boomerang projectile</> (projectile takes time to return)

操作<@ba.kw>浮游单元</>造成<@ba.kw>法术伤害</>\\n单元攻.en:
Attack with <@ba.kw>Drones</> to deal <@ba.kw>Arts damage</>
Drone deals more damage when it attacks the same enemy again (base damage increased, deals up to 110% of Operator's ATK as damage)

Attack with <@ba.kw>Drones</> to deal <@ba.kw>Arts damage</>
Drone deals more damage when it attacks the same enemy again (deals up to 120% of Operator's ATK as damage)

攻击造成<@ba.kw>法术伤害</>，攻击敌人时为攻击范围内一名友方干员治疗相.en: Attacks deal <@ba.kw>Arts</> damage and heal the HP of an ally within Attack Range for <@ba.kw>{scale:0%}</> of the damage dealt

每次特性消耗费用时攻击力+4%，最多可以叠加5次.en: ATK +4% whenever Trait cost is paid, stacking up to 5 times

范围内敌人越多造成的伤害越高（最高提升<@ba.kw>{damage_scale.en: Damage increases with number of enemies in the area (max increase <@ba.kw>{damage_scale:0%}</>)

不会受到攻击，只能部署在召唤者攻击范围内.en: Cannot be attacked, can only be deployed within the summoner's Attack Range

能够阻挡一个敌人，生命值高于50%时攻击速度<@ba.vup>+{attack_.en: Blocks 1 enemy; Gains <@ba.vup>+{attack_speed}</> ASPD when above 50% HP

攻击范围内存在敌人时技力自然恢复速度+0.2/秒.en: SP recovery +0.2/s when there are enemies within range

自身可以额外部署在近战位，陷阱可以额外部署在远程位.en: Can also be deployed on Melee tiles; Traps can also be deployed on Ranged tiles

不会受到攻击，无法放置于<@ba.kw>敌人已在</>的格子中.en: Cannot be attacked; cannot be deployed on tiles where enemies are <@ba.kw>already present</>

攻击使目标周围的其他敌人受到相当于攻击力<@ba.kw>50%</>的<@ba..en: Attacks deal <@ba.kw>50%</> Physical damage to other <@ba.kw>ground enemies</> in a small area

可以在攻击范围内选择一次<@ba.kw>战术点</>来召唤援军，援军受到来自自身.en: This unit can designate one <@ba.kw>Tactical Point</> within attack range to call Reinforcements; Reinforcements receives 15% less damage from enemies blocked by self ; ATK is increased to 150% when attacking enemies blocked by Reinforcements

可以在攻击范围内选择一次<@ba.kw>战术点</>来召唤援军，援军阻挡的敌人更.en: This unit can designate one <@ba.kw>Tactical Point</> within attack range to call Reinforcements; Enemies blocked by Reinforcements more likely to be attacked by allied unit; ATK is increased to 165% when attacking enemies blocked by Reinforcements

攻击造成<@ba.kw>法术伤害</>，可以造成<@ba.kw>元素损伤</>，.en: Attacks deal <@ba.kw>Arts damage</> and can inflict <@ba.kw>Elemental Damage</>. Not affected by <@ba.kw>Deployment Limit</>, but has a long Redeployment Time.

攻击附带<@ba.vup>{atk_scale_m:0%}</>攻击力的法术伤害.en: Attacks deal an additional <@ba.vup>{atk_scale_m:0%}</> ATK as Arts damage.

攻击范围内存在2名及以上敌人时攻击速度<@ba.vup>+12</>.en: ASPD <@ba.vup>+12</> when there are 2 or more enemies in attack range.

可攻击维什戴尔攻击范围内的敌人.en: Can attack enemies in Wiš'adel's attack range.

乌尔比安技能结束时返回该位置，并且其他干员不能部署.en: When skill ends, Ulpianus returns to this position and no other Operators may be deployed

子弹数量为空时下次装填额外加装1发子弹.en: When Ammo count is empty, the next reload +1 Ammo additionally

造成法术伤害时附带相当于<@ba.vup>8%</>伤害的<$ba.dt.bur.en: When dealing Arts damage, deals an additional <@ba.vup>8%</> as <$ba.dt.burning2>Burn damage</>

技能可以使敌人产生<@ba.kw>位移</>，向自身拖拽较远的敌人时力度提升一个.en:
Can <@ba.kw>Shift</> enemies by using skills; increases the strength of the shift by 1 degree when dragging enemies far away towards herself
Can be deployed on Ranged tiles

周围8格没有友方干员时攻击力和防御力<@ba.kw>+8%</>.en: When there are no allies in the surrounding 8 tiles, ATK and DEF <@ba.kw>+8%</>

攻击范围内的<@ba.kw>所有敌人</>，对自己前方一横排的敌人攻击力提升至<.en: Attacks <@ba.kw>all enemies</> within range, and deals 160% damage to enemies in the row directly in front of this unit.

能够阻挡一个敌人，作为小车形态存在时只能部署在召唤者攻击范围内.en: Can block enemy, can only be deployed within the summoner's Attack Range.

可以投掷<@ba.kw>炼金单元</>协助作战.en: Can throws <@ba.kw>Alchemist unit</> to assist in battle

在<@ba.kw>集成战略</>中，攻击时使自身和召唤物下次再部署时间减少<@b.en: In <@ba.kw>Integrated Strategies</>, reduces the Redeployment Time (including that of his summons) by <@ba.kw>1</> second when attacking; this effect also applies to his summons

受到的治疗效果提升<@ba.kw>20%</>.en: Increases this unit's healing received by 20%

不容易受到敌方攻击.en: Less likely to be targeted by enemies

能够阻挡一个敌人，攻击造成<@ba.kw>真实伤害</>.en: Can block enemy, attack deals <@ba.kw>True damage</>.

攻击范围内存在2名及以上其他干员时，攻击力<@ba.kw>+8%</>（不受技能.en: When there are 2 or more operators in Attack Range, ATK<@ba.kw>+8%</> (does not effected by skills)

不阻挡敌人时优先<@ba.kw>远程群体</>物理攻击且攻击速度<@ba.vup.en: When not blocking enemies, prioritizes dealing <@ba.kw>ranged AoE</> Physical damage and ASPD<@ba.vup>+10</>

能够阻挡三个敌人，可以造成元素损伤.en:
Can block 3 enemies
Can deal <@ba.kw>Elemental damage</>
能够阻挡三个敌人，可以造成元素损伤.note: new Ops primprotector/Primal Protector Archetype trait

<$ba.liftoff>起飞</>后能够阻挡2个飞行敌人.en: After <$ba.liftoff>Take off</> can block 2 aerial enemies

对精英和领袖敌人造成的元素损伤提升<@ba.kw>18%</>.en: Increase Elemental damage dealt to Elite/Boss enemies by 18%

在<@ba.kw>集成战略</>中，攻击额外造成<@ba.kw>一次</>攻击力.en: In <@ba.kw>[Integrated Strategies]</>, attack deal <@ba.kw>an addition instance</> of <@ba.kw>100%</>  ATK as Arts damage

在<@ba.kw>集成战略</>中，在场时全场敌人重量额外-1.en: In <@ba.kw>[Integrated Strategies]</>, All enemies -1 Weight Level

攻击造成<@ba.kw>法术伤害</>，可以通过击倒敌人生成<@ba.kw>召唤.en: Deal <@ba.kw>Arts Damage</></br>Can create <@ba.kw>Summons</> by defeating enemies</br>Can attack enemies blocked by own </>Summons</>
攻击造成<@ba.kw>法术伤害</>，可以通过击倒敌人生成<@ba.kw>召唤.name: Tecno

能够阻挡一个敌人，攻击造成法术伤害.en: Can block enemy, attack deals Arts damage.
能够阻挡一个敌人，攻击造成法术伤害.name: Puppet Dancer

攻击<$ba.dt.burning2>灼燃损伤</>爆发期间的目标时额外造成攻击.en: When target is under the burst effect of <$ba.dt.burning2>Burn Damage</>, deal an additional <@ba.kw>{ep_damage_ratio:0%}</> ATK as Elemental damage
攻击<$ba.dt.burning2>灼燃损伤</>爆发期间的目标时额外造成攻击.name: Viviana

自身阻挡的敌人受到<@ba.kw>10%</>的<$ba.magicfragil.en: Inflict <@ba.kw>10%</> <$ba.magicfragile>Arts Fragility</> to enemies block by self
自身阻挡的敌人受到<@ba.kw>10%</>的<$ba.magicfragil.name: Sideroca
